Boots Aha Serum

Brand: Boots No7

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: AQUA (WATER), GLYCERIN, GLYCOLIC ACID, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, LACTIC ACID, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, XANTHAN GUM, HYDROLYZED LINSEED EXTRACT, HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE, SODIUM BENZOATE, HYDROXYETHYLPIPERAZINE ETHANE SULFONIC ACID, HEXYLENE GLYCOL, STEPHANIA TETRANDA ROOT EXTRACT, VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE) SEED EXTRACT, DISODIUM EDTA, SODIUM ACETATE,
SODIUM BENZOATE, HYDROXYETHYLPIPERAZINE ETHANE SULFONIC ACID, HEXYLENE GLYCOL, STEPHANIA TETRANDA ROOT EXTRACT, VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE) SEED EXTRACT, DISODIUM EDTA, SODIUM ACETATE, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
